sentences.en: A shortcut is the shortest distance between two points.
sentences.cn: 捷径是两点之间最短的距离.

sentences.en: As a result, most applications use only the middle button as a shortcut.
sentences.cn: 因此, 多数应用程序只能将中间键当做快捷操作的捷径.

sentences.en: Be there a shortcut to the railway station, please?
sentences.cn: 请问去火车站有近道 吗 ?

sentences.en: Besides, getting wet was the greatest danger -- a shortcut to hypothermia.
sentences.cn: 何况, 被冰雪浸湿才是最大的危险,那样很容易造成体温过低.

sentences.en: Could you tell me how to use the shortcut?
sentences.cn: 你能告诉我怎么走这条近路 吗 ?

sentences.en: Fame can be a shortcut to love and money.
sentences.cn: 有了名气就容易收获爱情和金钱。

sentences.en: He was always looking for a shortcut to fame and fortune.
sentences.cn: 他总是在找成名发财的捷径.

sentences.en: I tried to take a shortcut and got lost.
sentences.cn: 我本来想抄近路，结果却迷路了。

sentences.en: If I take a shortcut, I can walk to school for only five minutes.
sentences.cn: 如果抄近路, 我只要步行5分钟就能到学校.

sentences.en: If you take the shortcut, it will be two li closer.
Let's take the shortcut across the sports field.
Speech signal is the most convenient and shortcut way of intercommunion.
sentences.cn: 语音对话是人们相互通讯和交流最方便快捷的手段.

sentences.en: There are many shortcut methods in moment distribution.
sentences.cn: 在弯矩分配中有很多的简化法.

sentences.en: There used to be a shortcut behind the hotel.
sentences.cn: 宾馆后面过去有一条近路.

sentences.en: To remove a shortcut, right - click the shortcut and select Remove Shortcut.
sentences.cn: 要删除快捷方式, 右键单击快捷方式,然后选择“删除快捷方式”.

trans.tran_cn: 捷径，近路，被切短的东西
trans.tran_en: A shortcut is a quicker way of getting somewhere than the usual route
